ing: 1 fluid ounce Canadian whiskey, such as Crown Royalâ„¢
1 fluid ounce Kahlua or other coffee flavored liqueur
des: "My husband's co-worker made us these drinks one night, it is a variation of a paralyzer.  They go down much smoother too, so you will not be feeling your legs after a few of these!"
ins: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour in the Canadian whiskey, coffee liqueur and root beer. Slowly pour in the milk so it does not curdle. Stir gently and enjoy immediately.
